title: Crushed Skull
description: The character suffers a fatal wound to the head. They are dead.

title: Destroyed Ear
description: The hit cuts the character's ear off (–5 Perception).

title: Missing Fingers
description: The character lost a few fingers from the powerful blow (–5 to Combat skills).

title: Punctured Lung
description: The character's lung is permanently damaged (–5 Stamina).

title: Cut Nose
description: The character lost their nose (–5 CHA).

title: Swollen Brain
description: The character suffered a severe brain injury (–5 INT).

title: Damaged Tendons
description: The character's arm tendons have suffered irreparable damage (–5 STR).

title: Nerve Damage
description: Permanent nerve damage means the character can only spend 3 Stamina points on defensive maneuvers each round.

title: Minor Artery Severed
description: The maximum number of Wounds the character may receive is reduced by 1.

title: Weakened
description: The injury has left the character's constitution weakened (+2 to all incoming damage).
